item.description:
So tax day can be pretty depressing... what you'll need is a good, old-fashioned sugar high, and where better than at an ALL YOU CAN EAT DESSERT FREAKOUT with amazing cupcakes, pies, tarts, cookies, brownies, cheesecakes, puddings and other delectables by the magicians LITTLE VEGAN MONSTERS.

When: Friday, April 16th, 6 - 9 pm

Where: Fuel Coffee, 516 Chapel St., Wooster Square, New Haven, CT

Cost: $15 advance or $20 at the door. Drinks extra.

Gluten-free options available

Tickets are on sale at Fuel (cash/checks only), or purchase with your credit card via our secure site. All sales are final and all proceeds go to benefit Woodstock Farm Animal Sanctuary! Yay!

http://woodstockfas.o...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have icing on my face.

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Dessert Freakout
